service.name: Regular Cleaning
service.description: Comprehensive cleaning for homes, including living areas, kitchens, and bathrooms.

service.name: Deep Cleaning
service.description: Thorough cleaning focusing on sanitization and hard-to-reach areas.

service.name: End of Lease Cleaning
service.description: Detailed cleaning service to ensure the property is in pristine condition for lease termination.

service.name: BBQ and Oven Cleaning
service.description: Specialized cleaning to remove grease and residue from BBQs and ovens.

service.name: Pressure Washing
service.description: High-pressure washing for outdoor areas, driveways, patios, and more.

service.name: Mould Removal
service.description: Professional mould removal to ensure a clean, healthy environment.

service.name: Spring Cleaning
service.description: Seasonal cleaning to refresh and revitalize all areas of your home.

service.name: Gym Cleaning
service.description: Specialized cleaning for gyms, including equipment and common areas to ensure hygiene.

service.name: Office Cleaning
service.description: Routine or one-time cleaning for office spaces to maintain a professional environment.
